Posts.Content: Hi Amanda thanks for your reply. I have just come out of hospital yesterday as they have found a blood clot on my lung. I don't know whether to ring the ward I was on or wait till Monday. Hope your treatment is going as well as can be expected x
Posts.Title: Just a question

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I'm new to all this never posted before! Anyway my names Clair im 38 and was diagnosed with breast cancer in September last year. I had a lumpectomy and am currently going through chemo. My question is I have found a scab on my nipple on my bad boob and I'm a little bit concerned about it. So just after some advice really do you think I should tell anybody about this as I'm convinced the cancer has come back
Posts.Title: Just a question

Posts.Content: It's all good breast care nurse not worried at all...phew x
